description: Query the WATCH RGD instance and pull down images from within a specified date range and bounding box.
name: kitware/rgd_ingress

optional_parameters.description: Don't actually download the retrieved imagery
optional_parameters.help_text: If set to 1, no image data will be copied locally. Only the STAC catalog structure will be created.
optional_parameters.name: dry_run

optional_parameters.description: Maximum amount of cloud cover allowed before a STAC item is filtered out
optional_parameters.help_text: The cloud cover value here is as reported in the STAC item's "properties" "eo:cloudcover" field, if specified.  If the property is not specified, the item is not filtered out.
optional_parameters.name: max_cloud_cover

optional_parameters.description: Minimum amount of overlap an image must have with the selected AOI to be kept
optional_parameters.name: min_aoi_overlap

outputs.description: Directory where output images / data have been written.
outputs.name: output_dir

required_parameters.description: Spatial bounds of the Area of Interest (AOI).
required_parameters.help_text: The AOI bounds should be in the form: '[min_lon, min_lat, max_lon, max_lat]'
required_parameters.name: aoi_bounds

required_parameters.description: Pull down images from within this date range
required_parameters.help_text: Date range should be in the form: '[\"start_date\", \"end_date\"]', where both start_date and end_date are in the form "YYYY-MM-DD"
required_parameters.name: date_range

required_parameters.description: Directory where output images / data will be written. Will be created if it doesn't already exist.
required_parameters.name: output_dir
